channel.title: Help on my client!

item.title: Help on my client!
item.dc:creator: @jcrane164 jcrane164
item.description:
@jcrane164 wrote:

Ok that code gives u a mask item id… i know how to change color etc… idk how to change the item itself… like… to change the whole item not color but the item… please help? also isnt there a color generator for clients?

if(i == 1057){ //Black Mask class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wear"; class8.anIntArray156 = new int[1]; class8.anIntArray160 = new int [1]; class8.anIntArray156[0] = 10222; class8.anIntArray160[0] = 0; class8.anInt174 = 2438; class8.anInt181 = 730; class8.anInt190 = 516; class8.anInt198 = 0; class8.anInt204 = 0; class8.anInt169 = 0; class8.anInt194 = -10; class8.anInt165 = 3188; class8.anInt200 = 3192; class8.anInt175 = 1755; class8.anInt197 = 3187; class8.aString170 = "Black Mask"; class8.aByteArray178 = "It's a Black mask.".getBytes(); }
It would be awesome if u helped
